subject: parallel test directories and eclipse
msgSnippet: Hi, Has anyone had any success getting Eclipse to understand a project whose junit code is organized as follows: src/ java/ a/b/c test/ a/b/c I imagine it can
messageBody:
Hi,

Has anyone had any success getting Eclipse to understand a project
whose junit code is organized as follows:

src/
java/
a/b/c
test/
a/b/c

I imagine it can be done, but I've not been able to get Eclipse to
shut up - it says it can't find src/test's dependencies, ie the ones
in src/java

Bill de hÓra
